bilingual.source: What other types of entertainment have you seen?
bilingual.target: 你还看过其他什么类型的娱乐节目？

bilingual.source: Which of these types of entertainment are you most familiar with?
bilingual.target: 你对这些娱乐类型中哪一种最熟悉？

bilingual.source: People began to listen to the radio, not only for entertainment.
bilingual.target: 人们开始听收音机，不仅仅是为了娱乐。
这个娱乐节目非常有趣。
这个城市有很多娱乐场所。

bilingual.source: I like to watch entertainment on weekends.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢在周末看娱乐节目。
孩子们喜欢看卡通娱乐节目。
我们需要一些娱乐节目来放松一下。
你最喜欢的娱乐场所是哪一个？

bilingual.source: They aired a new entertainment on TV.
bilingual.target: 他们在电视上播放了一个新的娱乐节目。

list.abstract: entertainment（英[ˌentəˈteɪnmənt]，美[ˌentərˈteɪnmənt]），英语单词，名词，意思为娱乐；娱乐活动；招待。短语搭配有entertainment industry（娱乐业）。例句为“Beijing Opera is a kind of entertainment.（京剧是一种娱乐。）” entertainment名词类近义词有recreation、pleasure、sport等，形容词为entertaining，动词形式为entertain，复数形式为entertainments。
《entertainment》是Phoenix演唱的一首歌曲，收录在2013年3月13日发行的专辑《Bankrupt! (Deluxe)》中。

yingyinNormal.en: So you wanna watch Entertainment Tonight? Thanks.
So you guys having any luck getting rid of the entertainment center?
The show features every type of Chinese entertainment, including, of course, martial arts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚会囊括了中国各类娱乐形式，当然包括武术。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, what are we gonna do about this? Well, I guess we could tape Entertainment Tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这件事我们怎么解决？我们可以把“今夜娱乐”录下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Wouldn't you pay good money to see these identical hands showcased in some type of a entertainment venue?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你愿不愿意花大钱去看手掌一模一样的两个人这种娱乐性的演出？

yingyinNormal.en: I wanna watch Entertainment Tonight. Tough noogies, we're watching Predators of the Serengeti.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要看“今夜娱乐”。真不幸，我们要看“塞伦盖蒂野生国家公园的掠食者”。

yingyinNormal.en: Your monkey found a new career, in the entertainment field. That's all I know. This is unbelievable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的猴子有了新职业了，往娱乐界发展去了，我只知道这一些。真是令人难以置信。

yingyinNormal.en: When the Chinese aren't splashing out on the beach-holidays, they are turning to television and cinema for their entertainment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当中国人不再为海滨度假挥金如土时，他们转而将观看影视作品作为娱乐方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Against this ever-changing landscape, millions of Chinese still observe ancient traditions and rights, once discovering new forms of leisure and entertainment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 华夏大地，日新月异，却有很多中国人仍遵循传统与古法，也发现了休闲娱乐的新方式。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's okay. I don't have to go. I'm happy just to guide you and your ladies to suitable entertainment choices. I'm a walking brown Yelp.Com.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，没事儿的，我不必去的，我很荣幸能给你和你们的女人提供合适的娱乐建议，我就是个棕色人型口碑网。

yingyinNormal.en: To feed this hunger for entertainment that was denied to them for decades, south of Shanghai in Zhejiang province, a massive complex has been built.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为满足人们对娱乐数十年来从未被满足的渴望，在上海之南的浙江省，一个巨大的综合设施早已拔地而起。

yingyinNormal.en: Before you go, consider this. Not only do I have a deep cycle marine battery power source which is more than capable of running our entertainment system, I also have all 61 episodes of the BBC series Red Dwarf and Fiddle Faddle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，考虑下这个，我不但有深循环的海军陆战队电池，这能更好地支持我们的娱乐活动。我还有一共61集的BBC科幻剧《红矮星号》，还有《无聊星人》。

yingyinNormal.en: It also faces the television at a direct angle, allowing me to immerse myself in entertainment or game play without being subjected to conversation. As a result, I've placed it in a state of eternal dibs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且正对着电视机，我能专心看电视或者打机，不受谈话干扰。因此，我把它置于永恒状态了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 招待; 款待; 请客

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an event, performance, or activity designed to entertain others

examination_example.sentence: Facebook and Google, the two virtual giants, dominate digital advertising to the disadvantage of all other media and <highlight>entertainment</highlight> companies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Facebook和谷歌这两家虚拟巨头在数字广告领域的主导地位，令其他所有媒体和娱乐公司处于劣势。

examination_example.sentence: Court, school, organizations of amateurs, and the traveling actors were all rivals in supplying a widespread desire for dramatic <highlight>entertainment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宫廷、学校、业余爱好者组织和巡回演员在满足戏剧娱乐的广泛需求方面都是竞争对手。

sense_info_list.en: the action of providing or being provided with amusement or enjoyment
sense_info_list.zh: 招待; 款待; 请客

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指引起兴趣、逗乐、分散注意力的其他的行动。
通常指改变一下工作，或为了放松一下身体，或清醒一下脑子的纵情消遣。
指轻松的、无目的的、随便的逗乐。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 娱乐；娱乐活动；招待；款待；请客；文娱表演
adj. 供人娱乐的；娱乐性的

word_family.mean: v. 给…娱乐；使快乐；对（意见；建议；感情）给予考虑；招待；款待

sense_info_list.en: the action of providing or being provided with amusement or enjoyment

examination_example.sentence: Most universities host welcome events before the academic year officially begins, including freshmen orientations (迎新会), campus picnics, and <highlight>entertainments</highlight> like concerts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数大学在学年正式开始前都会举办欢迎活动，包括新生迎新会、校园野餐和音乐会等娱乐活动。

examination_example.sentence: Moran says one of the problems with jazz today is that the <highlight>entertainment</highlight> aspect of the music has been lost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫兰说，当今爵士乐的一个问题是，音乐的娱乐性已经丧失。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦想一些美妙的家庭娱乐吗?

examination_example.sentence: These pets have been developed at huge cost mainly to provide <highlight>entertainment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些宠物的开发花费巨大，主要是为了提供娱乐。

examination_example.sentence: Offering a full day of wonderful adventures, Legoland gives fun, imagination, and <highlight>entertainment</highlight> to today's youngsters and their families.
